targets.query: SELECT (100 * "total_used_bytes" / "total_bytes") as util  FROM "ceph_usage" order by desc limit 1
SELECT last("num_osds") FROM "ceph_osdmap_cmd"
select last(total_used_bytes) from ceph_usage
select last(total_used_bytes) from ceph_usage
select last(total_used_bytes) from ceph_usage
SELECT last("num_in_osds") FROM "ceph_osdmap_cmd"
SELECT last("num_up_osds") FROM "ceph_osdmap_cmd"

SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT sum("value") as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^osd\.[0-9]+/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.stat_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)) GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT sum("value") as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^osd\.[0-9]+/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.stat_bytes_used') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)) GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 1s) as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^osd\.[0-9]+$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_w_in_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)) GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 1s) as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^osd\.[0-9]+$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_r_out_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)) GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 1s) as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^osd\.[0-9]+$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_w') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)) GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 1s) as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^osd\.[0-9]+$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_r') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)) GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT mean("w") AS "write", mean("r") AS "read" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(sum("latency_w.value")) / non_negative_difference(sum("op_w.value")) AS "w", non_negative_difference(sum("latency_r.value")) / non_negative_difference(sum("op_r.value")) AS "r" FROM "ceph_daemon_stats_join" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)) GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT top(mean, "ceph_daemon", 5), "host" FROM (SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$OSDS$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_w_in_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ceph_daemon") GROUP BY "ceph_daemon", "host")

SELECT top(mean, "ceph_daemon", 5), "host" FROM (SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$OSDS$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_r_out_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ceph_daemon") GROUP BY "ceph_daemon", "host")

SELECT top(mean, "ceph_daemon", 5), "host" FROM (SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$OSDS$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_w') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ceph_daemon") GROUP BY "ceph_daemon", "host")

SELECT top(mean, "ceph_daemon", 5), "host" FROM (SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$OSDS$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_r') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ceph_daemon") GROUP BY "ceph_daemon", "host")

SELECT top(mean, "ceph_daemon", 5), "host" FROM (SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("latency_w.value") / non_negative_difference("op_w.value") as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats_join" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$OSDS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ceph_daemon") GROUP BY "ceph_daemon", "host")

SELECT top(mean, "ceph_daemon", 5), "host" FROM (SELECT mean(d) FROM (SELECT non_negative_difference("latency_r.value") / non_negative_difference("op_r.value") as d FROM "ceph_daemon_stats_join" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$OSDS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ceph_daemon") GROUP BY "ceph_daemon", "host")

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$osd$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_r_out_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ceph_daemon"
SELECT non_negative_derivative("value", 1s) FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$osd$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_w_in_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ceph_daemon"
SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$osd$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_in_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ceph_daemon"
SELECT derivative("value", 1s) FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$osd$/ AND "type_instance" = 'osd.op_in_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ceph_daemon"

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("latency_w.value")) / non_negative_difference(mean("op_w.value")) FROM "ceph_daemon_stats_join" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$OSDS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ceph_daemon"

SELECT non_negative_difference(mean("latency_r.value")) / non_negative_difference(mean("op_r.value")) FROM "ceph_daemon_stats_join" WHERE ("ceph_daemon" =~ /^$OSDS$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "ceph_daemon"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WHERE ("pool_name" =~ /^$pool$/ AND "type_instance" = 'rd_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "pool_name"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("value"), 1s) FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WHERE ("pool_name" =~ /^$POOLS$/ AND "type_instance" = 'wr_bytes') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "pool_name"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WITH KEY = "ceph_daemon"
list.label: OSD(s)
list.name: OSDS
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WITH KEY = "ceph_daemon"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WITH KEY = "pool_name"
list.label: Pool(s)
list.name: POOLS
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ceph_pool_stats" WITH KEY = "pool_name"
